long_description: The REI Sariska T-shirt is a stylish top with moisture-wicking fabric that makes a tough yoga class easier by guarding heat during the warm up and keeping you comfortably dry as the class progresses. Lightweight fabric boosts wicks moisture and dries quickly as you begin to perspire. Dolman sleeves are wide at the arm holes and won't restrict movement; extended cuffs warm wrists. REI Sariska offers a classic fit that's sized just right for use in yoga class.
short_description: The REI Sariska T-shirt is a stylish top with moisture-wicking fabric that makes a tough yoga class easier by guarding heat during the warm up and keeping you comfortably dry as the class progresses.
